itemDescription: British miner, trade unionist and politician

wikipedia_page.main: James Walton (7 September 1867 – 26 January 1924) was a British miner, trade unionist and politician who served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Don Valley in Yorkshire from 1918 to 1922.

link_mentions.page: List of Parliamentary constituencies in West Yorkshire

response: James Walton or Jim Walton may refer to:
*James Walton (MP for Don Valley) (1867–1924), British politician
